潩字的基本解释

潩
yì
〔潩水〕今中国河南省清潩河的古称。

潩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》羊吏切，去志，以。］
［《廣韻》與職切，入職，以。］
古水名。今名清潩河。在今河南省新郑县，南流入颍水。

潩字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潩； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页650第07
【唐韻】與職切【集韻】【韻會】逸職切，?音弋。水名。【說文】水出河南密縣大隗山。　又【集韻】叱力切，音瀷。又【廣韻】【集韻】?羊吏切，音異。義?同。　【六書故】潩，亦作瀷。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
yì
〔潩水〕The ancient name of Qinglu River in Henan Province, China today.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" sheep officials cut, go to record, to. ]
["Guangyun" is related to the job cut, entry, to. ]
Ancient water name. Today's name is Qingluhe. In today's Xinzheng County, Henan Province, it flows into Yingshui to the south.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潩; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 650 No. 07
[Tang Yun] Cut with the job [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Cut with the job,? Yin Yi. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Dayui Mountain, Mi County, Henan Province.　[Jiyun] Chi Li cut, sound 瀷. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Sheep officials cut, with different sounds. Righteous? Same.　【Six Books of the Past】潩, also used as 瀷.
